oai_dc:dc.dc:title: 1960-08-26 Request for Admission of Facts
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: law; libraries; civil rights; desegregation; Randolph, Wassell; Montedonico, John S.; 1960s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: "Dear Mr. Randolph: -- You will find enclosed herewith request for admissions of fact just served upon us by mail this morning. -- After you have had an opportunity to review these requests and make such comparisons as will be required, please call us for an appointment in the latter part of next week. In the meantime we, of course, will render such assistance as you may request of us. -- With best wishes, I am -- Sincerely, -- John Montedonico.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Montedonico, John
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: eight pages, typed, varying sizes (one oversize)
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: IntLib090, IntLib091, IntLib092, IntLib093, IntLib094, IntLib095, IntLib096, IntLib097, IntLib098
